p: Kim et al. [ 74] were able to establish the optimal culture conditions for mycelial growth of H. radicata at 25 Â°C and pH 6.0. This species was successfully grown on sawdust, with biological efficiency of 100% [ 70]. The addition of 10% rice bran to oak sawdust stimulated mycelial growth since it may contain ingredients favourable for mycelial growth for H. radicata [ 69].
